title: Enchanting Kundan & Emerald Mohana Mala - A Timeless Haaram
materials: 22K Gold (916 Hallmark) with Premium Kundan Setting
and Brilliant-Cut Cubic Zirconia (CZ). Expertly crafted with traditional Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This exquisite Haaram features a traditional circular Kundan setting, intricately detailed with concentric circles of CZ stones surrounding vibrant green Emeralds. The design gracefully tapers towards the neckline for a comfortable and flattering fit. Subtle ruby accents are added for enhanced appeal. The back of the necklace showcases a secure and adjustable gold chain closure.
colors: Primarily gold with striking green Emeralds and sparkling white CZ stones. Subtle ruby accents provide a touch of warmth and contrast. The color palette evokes a sense of opulence and tradition.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. An ideal heirloom piece for bridal wear or special family functions like seemantham or half-saree function (Langa Voni Function/ లంగా ఓణి వేడుక). Can also be styled with modern South Indian attire for a sophisticated statement.
description: Experience the allure of tradition with this stunning Kundan and Emerald Haaram. Its meticulous craftsmanship, high-quality gemstones, and timeless design make it a treasured addition to any jewelry collection. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a radiant and long-lasting shine. This piece embodies cultural significance, making it a cherished family heirloom for generations to come.
